<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online Exhibitions -Until the last Jew</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlineausstellungen - bis den letzten Juden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expositions en ligne - jusqu'au dernier juif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exhibitions em linha - até o último jew</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mostre in linea - fino all'ultimo ebreo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση εκθέσεις - μέχρι τον τελευταίο 
Εβραίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exposiciones en línea - hasta el judío pasado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This exhibition consists of photos which reflect the uncompromising efforts of the Nazis 60 years ago to murder every Jew in Europe. Although the Allied victory seemed imminent, the Nazis gathered their remaining resources to locate, deport and murder Jews. These photos bear witness to their relentless and uncompromising efforts and to the enormous pain of their victims.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extermination camps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">final solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nazis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photos</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vor diese Ausstellung besteht aus Fotos, die die 
kompromisslosen Bemühungen der Nazin 60 Jahren an Mord jeder Jude in 
Europa mitteilen. Obgleich der verbündete Sieg unmittelbar 
drohend schien, erfaßten die Nazin ihre restlichen Betriebsmittel, um
Juden zu lokalisieren, zu verbannen und zu ermorden. Diese Fotos
bestäten ihre unnachgiebigen und kompromisslosen Bemühungen und die 
enormen Schmerz ihrer Opfer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette exposition se compose des photos qui 
reflètent les efforts intransigeants des Nazis il y a 60 ans au
meurtre chaque juif en Europe. Bien que la victoire alliée ait 
semblé imminente, les Nazis ont recueilli leurs ressources 
restantes pour localiser, expulser et assassiner des juifs. Ces 
photos témoignent de leurs efforts implacables et intransigeants et 
de l'énorme douleur de leurs victimes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este exhibition consiste nas fotos que refletem 
os esforços uncompromising dos nazis 60 anos há ao assassinato cada 
jew em Europa. Embora a vitória aliada parecesse imminent, os 
nazis recolheram seus recursos restantes para encontrar, deport e 
assassinar jews. Estas fotos testimoniam seus esforços 
relentless e uncompromising e a dor enorme de suas vítimas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa mostra consiste delle foto che riflettono 
gli sforzi intransigenti dei nazis 60 anni fa all'omicidio ogni ebreo 
in Europa. Anche se la vittoria alleata ha sembrato imminente, i
nazis hanno riunito le loro risorse restanti per individuare,
deport ed assassinare gli ebrei. Queste foto testimoniano il ai 
loro sforzi relentless ed intransigenti ed al dolore enorme delle loro
vittime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η έκθεση αποτελείται από τις φωτογραφίες που 
απεικονίζουν τις ασυμβίβαστες προσπάθειες των Ναζί 60 έτη πριν
για να δολοφονήσουν κάθε Εβραίο στην Ευρώπη. Αν και η 
συνδεμένη νίκη φάνηκε επικείμενη, τα Ναζί σύλλεξαν τα υπόλοιπα 
στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς τους για να εντοπίσουν, να απελάσουν και να 
δολοφονήσουν τους Εβραίους. Αυτές οι φωτογραφίες ενισχύουν 
τις ανηλεείς και ασυμβίβαστες προσπάθειές τους και τον τεράστιο 
πόνο των θυμάτων τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta exposición consiste en las fotos que 
reflejan los esfuerzos inflexibles de los nazis hace 60 años al 
asesinato cada judío en Europa. Aunque la victoria aliada se 
parecía inminente, los nazis recolectaron sus recursos restantes para
localizar, deportan y asesinan a judíos. Estas fotos 
testimonian a sus esfuerzos implacables e inflexibles y al dolor 
enorme de sus víctimas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausrottunglager</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">abschließende Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nazin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">camps d'extermination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solution finale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nazis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">photos</string>
